plot: Digging peat for food and board on a rundown Scottish Highland croft, Georgios discovers the stark difference between his disappearance and disintegration.
title: As He Lay Falling
plot_es: Digging peat for food and board on a rundown Scottish Highland croft, Georgios discovers the stark difference between his disappearance and disintegration.
plot_en: Digging peat for food and board on a rundown Scottish Highland croft, Georgios discovers the stark difference between his disappearance and disintegration.
